s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR NO. 1 SEAT RECLINING COVER LH

s2.ptxt: Remove the screw.
Using a screwdriver, detach the claw labeled A.

atten4.ptxt: Tape the screwdriver tip before use.

s2.ptxt: Pull the reclining cover in the direction indicated by the arrow in the illustration to detach the claw labeled B and remove the reclining cover.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR NO. 1 SEAT BELT ASSEMBLY INNER RH

s2.ptxt: Remove the bolt and seat belt.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE RECLINING ADJUSTER RELEASE HANDLE RH

s2.ptxt: Remove the screw and release handle.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR NO. 1 SEAT RECLINING COVER RH

s2.ptxt: Remove the screw.
Using a screwdriver, detach the claw labeled A.

atten4.ptxt: Tape the screwdriver tip before use.

s2.ptxt: Pull the reclining cover in the direction indicated by the arrow in the illustration to detach the claw labeled B and remove the reclining cover.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR NO. 1 SEAT CUSHION COVER RH

s2.ptxt: Partially remove the rear No. 1 seat cushion cover RH (See page ).
Slightly raise the No. 1 seat cushion pad RH.

atten4.ptxt: It is not necessary to completely remove the No. 1 seat cushion cover pad RH.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR SEAT LAP TYPE BELT ASSEMBLY CENTER

s2.ptxt: Remove the bolt and seat belt center.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR SEAT LAP TYPE BELT ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Remove the bolt and seat belt LH.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR NO. 1 SEAT RECLINING COVER RH

s2.ptxt: Remove the screw.
Using a screwdriver, detach the claw labeled A.

atten4.ptxt: Tape the screwdriver tip before use.

s2.ptxt: Pull the reclining cover in the direction indicated by the arrow in the illustration to detach the claw labeled B and remove the reclining cover.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR NO. 1 SEAT BELT ASSEMBLY INNER LH

s2.ptxt: Remove the bolt and seat belt.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR NO. 2 SEAT INNER BELT ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Remove the nut and seat belt.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR NO. 2 SEAT LAP TYPE BELT ASSEMBLY CENTER

s2.ptxt: Remove the seat belt.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR NO. 2 SEAT INNER BELT ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Remove the nut and seat belt.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR NO. 2 SEAT LAP TYPE BELT ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Remove the seat belt.
